name: Don Dilshan
designation: Board of Directors / Head Coach & Academy Developer / Major League Captain
description: Our head coach brings a wealth of experience and passion to the game. With a backgroundin professional cricket, he has honed his skills both as a player and as a mentor. His focus is on fostering talent, instilling discipline, and nurturing a love for the sport in every player he works with. Whether coaching beginners or refining the skills of seasoned athletes, he is dedicated to helping players achieve their full potential on and off the field.

name: Merita Perera
description: Results-driven Accounting Professional with a strong background in Accounting and Finance complemented by CIMA-UK (Chartered Institute of Management Accountants) qualification. Proven track record of delivering accurate and timely Financial Information, ensuring compliance with Accounting Standards.

name: Sriram Akam
description: Specialising in : Batting and Bowling coaching for senior players alongside with the head coach
